name: Go Gobelins !
description:
Hello !

I created this game with Ace_Ced for the Ludum Dare #43. This is our first game to be published.

Theme was "Sacrifice must be made". 

I hope you'll enjoy leading your army to glory :D

Better with sounds ;D

Bug fixe : You can't spawn more than 55 units but it fixes bugs tat happened when you had too much units.

Post Ludum Fix : You can now speed up the game when you press spacebar
